name: LiveAssist
summary: A framework to provide customers with more immediate and personalized support within your company's mobile applications.
description:
LiveAssist provides customers with more immediate and personalized support within your company's mobile applications.
Live Assist helps agents resolve issues more quickly to increase customer satisfaction through an immersive chat and co-browse experience.
